data.value: An internal error occured, and the operation was aborted to protect the backup sets

data.name: ManifestsMustBeReadOnBackups
data.value: It is not allowed to disable manifest reading when performing a backup. Disabling manifests is only possible on restores, and it should only be used as a last resort.

data.name: ManifestVersionRequiresRelativeNamesWarning
data.value: One or more manifests are from version 1, which requires that filenames searched are relative
